problems.title: Binary Search - Count Occurrences
problems.description:
Problem Statement

You are given a sorted array of N integers (may contain duplicates) and a target X.
Using Binary Search, count how many times X appears in the array.
If X is not present, print 0.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
8
1 2 2 2 3 4 5 5
2

Sample Output
3

Explanation:
Element 2 appears at indices 1, 2, 3. Count = 3.
problems.constraints:
1 <= N <= 1000
-10000 <= arr[i] <= 10000
Array is sorted in ascending order
